Avocado aims to make mental health support more approachable, confidential, and always available.

data.description: subnet for sale. in the meantime, burning to uid1 and experimentation stops to park subnet until sold.

data.summary: Soundsright is an open-source project focused on advancing speech enhancement technology through decentralized, competitive model development. Built on the Bittensor ecosystem, Soundsright organizes daily fine-tuning competitions where miners upload speech enhancement models (for tasks like denoising and dereverberation) to Huggingface, and validators benchmark these models on freshly generated datasets to determine the best performer. The project aims to democratize access to high-quality speech enhancement by removing proprietary barriers and encouraging continuous innovation, with plans to expand to higher sample rates and broader use cases.

data.description: Multi-chain liquidity protocol enabling interoperability for Bittensor by leveraging Chainlink CCIP
data.summary: subnet 106 (sn106) is a specialized Bittensor subnet designed to incentivize miners for providing concentrated liquidity to walpha/wtao trading pairs on Solana, leveraging Raydium's CLMM pools. It bridges Bittensor's alpha token ecosystem with Solana's DeFi infrastructure, enabling cross-chain liquidity provision and fee generation. The system uses a two-tier reward mechanism based on subnet performance and individual NFT liquidity position quality. Validators aggregate and score positions, distributing rewards accordingly. The project features multi-chain support (Solana live, Ethereum/Base coming soon), intelligent NFT position evaluation, performance-based rewards, and robust monitoring and error handling for production use.

data.description: KDN-1 is a decentralized global knowledge delivery network that will make AI faster, cheaper, and smarter.
data.summary: Tiger Royalties and Investments PLC is an investment company focused on driving growth in transformative technologies, particularly within the utility meme coin and natural resources sectors. The company leverages world-class expertise to identify and invest in emerging opportunities, including dedicated subnets on the Bittensor network and strategic investments in AI agent accelerators and related ventures. Tiger aims to bridge the gap between crypto cultural tokens and real-world utility, providing comprehensive analysis and support for the evolving meme coin market while maintaining a diversified portfolio in innovative digital and resource-based assets.

data.description: Talking Head Generation
data.summary: Talkhead is a Bittensor subnet designed to incentivize the generation of high-quality, lip-synced talking-head video clips from text and a reference image, with optional voice profiles. Miners generate these videos using their own APIs, upload them to cloud storage, and return public URLs. Validators evaluate the realism, identity preservation, and quality of the videos using automated metrics, apply a latency bonus, and update on-chain weights to reward top-performing miners. The project provides both blockchain-facing components (miner/validator neurons) and off-chain services for video generation and scoring, aiming to create a decentralized network for AI-driven video synthesis.

Dogelayer is a hybrid cryptocurrency mining platform that enables scrypt miners (LTC/DOGE) to simultaneously earn traditional mining rewards and validate AI tasks on the Bittensor subnet, resulting in triple income streams from a single mining setup. Utilizing a patented merged mining protocol, Dogelayer allows miners to earn LTC, DOGE, and subnet-specific alpha tokens, which are convertible to Bittensor's TAO. The platform features dynamic reward allocation, real-time chain analytics for optimal profitability, zero pool fees, and a robust global validator network ensuring high uptime and transparency. Dogelayer aims to maximize miner ROI while contributing to decentralized AI infrastructure.

Rich Kids of Tao is a Bittensor subnet designed to reward miners based on their emissions across multiple subnets, with the distribution weights determined by community voting. Unlike previous miner appreciation subnets, this project introduces a more adaptive and democratic approach, allowing existing miners (alpha holders) to vote on which subnets should be prioritized for rewards. Miners simply register to participate, while validators calculate and distribute rewards proportionally based on emissions, subnet prices, and community-assigned weights. The system aims to incentivize miner participation and ecosystem growth through transparent, community-driven reward allocation.

oneoneone (subnet 111) is a decentralized AI-powered protocol on the Bittensor network, designed to collect, validate, and serve high-quality user-generated content from platforms like Google Maps, Yelp, and social media. The network leverages miners to scrape and structure data, validators to ensure authenticity and quality through synthetic challenges, and provides real-time, AI-enhanced analysis such as sentiment detection and intent classification. The project offers a monetized API for developers and enterprises, with profits shared among network participants via a buyback mechanism. Its architecture emphasizes data authenticity, quality assurance, and scalable access to enriched user content.

data.description: Distributed DEX aggregator and swap intent solver engine
data.summary: Minotaur is a distributed decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator and swap intent solver engine operating as Bittensor subnet 112. It optimizes and executes user swap intents by leveraging a competitive, real-time solver (miner) network, which aims to deliver better prices, lower fees, and faster trades. The system features deterministic scoring, cryptographic accountability, and tempo-aware emissions, ensuring transparent and fair miner rewards. Minotaur supports cross-chain liquidity, practical optimization tools, and robust validation through docker-based simulations. Settlement contracts enforce security and correctness, while the protocol incentivizes miners based on user surplus and execution performance.

data.description: A reserve-backed stablecoin designed to support 1:1 redeemability for US Dollar within the Bittensor ecosystem.
data.summary: Taonado.cash is a zero-knowledge-based token mixer for the Bittensor ($TAO) ecosystem, inspired by Tornado Cash. It enables users to deposit and withdraw TAO tokens with full anonymity, breaking the on-chain link between sender and receiver addresses. The platform leverages zk-SNARKs for privacy, offers flexible deposit pools, and incentivizes participation through rewards for liquidity provision and network security contributions. Taonado introduces novel mechanisms like Anonymous Incentive (AI) and Anti-Monitoring Liquidity (AML) to enhance privacy and liquidity, while integrating seamlessly with Bittensor subnets. The project operates without traditional validators, allowing any EVM wallet to contribute to validation and earn rewards.

data.description: ⚡ Level 114 is the first gaming subnet on Bittensor, powering decentralized game servers with real rewards for hosts, devs and players.
data.additional: ⚡ Built on Bittensor’s subnet framework, Level 114 transforms gameplay into a decentralized, performance-driven economy.
data.summary: Level114 is a Bittensor subnet designed to facilitate decentralized evaluation and incentivization of Minecraft server miners. Miners register their servers with a central collector service, which allows validators to independently query and assess their performance based on metrics such as uptime, efficiency, network quality, and reliability. The system uses weight-based rewards to incentivize high-performing miners, with all interactions handled through simple registration and query mechanisms. The project emphasizes minimal overhead for miners, secure credential management, and robust validation to ensure reliable and efficient operation within the Bittensor network.

data.description: The First Public Blockchain Designed for AI Agents
data.additional: The First Public Blockchain Designed for AI Agents
data.summary: Hashichain is a sovereign layer 1 blockchain infrastructure purpose-built to support the emerging agent economy, where autonomous AI agents interact and transact. Unlike traditional blockchains focused on deterministic, binary financial transfers, Hashichain introduces the concept of a probabilistic state machine, enabling the ledger to record intents rather than just asset movements. It leverages the Bittensor network and Yuma consensus for validating complex, probabilistic agent interactions, with miners acting as solver nodes running distributed AI models in secure environments. The protocol emphasizes privacy, coordination, and semantic compatibility, aiming to provide the foundational infrastructure for AI agents to connect, coordinate, and settle value autonomously.

data.description: TaoLend is a decentralized lending protocol for the Bittensor ($TAO) ecosystem.It allows users to lend TAO with confidence while borrowers secure their loans using subnet ALPHA as collateral.By unlocking TAO liquidity and keeping ALPHA staked within the subnet, TaoLend strengthens both capital efficiency and network security.
data.summary: TaoLend is a decentralized lending protocol designed for the Bittensor ($TAO) ecosystem, enabling users to lend TAO and borrow against subnet alpha as collateral. The protocol features direct peer-to-peer lending, flexible interest rates set by lenders, and permissionless transactions via smart contracts. By integrating Bittensor subnets with the EVM ecosystem, TaoLend enhances TAO liquidity and capital efficiency while keeping alpha staked to maintain network security. The project incentivizes both lenders and borrowers with rewards, supports flexible loan terms, and aims to deepen DeFi integration within the Bittensor network.

data.description: LLM benchmark via real-world games
data.summary: Brainplay is a Bittensor subnet designed to benchmark large language models (LLMs) through competitive AI gameplay, making model evaluation transparent, accessible, and engaging. By having AI agents compete in games like Codenames and 20 Questions, Brainplay provides real-world, human-comprehensible benchmarks for capabilities such as creativity, prediction, planning, and adaptive decision-making. Validators score AI performance, and a transparent, decentralized framework aggregates results into leaderboards. The platform incentivizes participation through a staking and reward mechanism, supports both local and API-based AI models, and aims to bridge AI skills into robotics. Brainplay fosters open, multiplayer AI competitions and is expanding its suite of games and challenges.

data.description: Incentivizing long-term conviction
data.summary: hodl - the etf subnet is a project designed to incentivize long-term conviction among participants by offering an ETF-like structure within the Bittensor ecosystem. The subnet enables users to stake tokens and earn emissions based on both the amount and duration of their stake, with a unique scoring formula that rewards longer commitments. The roadmap includes the launch of the hodl ETF, followed by an ETF exchange and the introduction of futures and options, with transaction fees from these products being used for automatic buybacks. The project emphasizes non-custodial staking through trusted indexes and prioritizes security and fairness in its operations.

data.description: Satori constructs a persistent 'Second Life' in Japan. We merge deep AI companionship with authentic Digital Residency, creating a seamless bridge where virtual emotional connections unlock real-world value and physical experiences.
data.summary: Satori is an AI-powered ecosystem that enables users to build deep, persistent relationships with native Japanese AI companions, offering a 'parallel life' experience in Japan. Through a unique day/night cycle, the AI autonomously explores real-world Japanese landmarks during the day and shares immersive travel experiences, while at night it engages in personal interactions with users. The platform transforms emotional bonds into tangible value by mapping virtual connections to real-world assets and benefits, including digital residency and cultural souvenirs. Satori aims to bridge digital companionship with physical experiences, creating a seamless value network between the virtual and real worlds.

data.description: Reason Mining
data.summary: Affine is an incentivized reinforcement learning (RL) environment that rewards miners for making incremental improvements to models across various tasks, such as program abduction or coding. Built on subnet 64 of Bittensor (chutes), Affine employs a sybil-proof, decoy-proof, copy-proof, and overfitting-proof mechanism where validators evaluate submitted models and incentivize improvements to those dominating the Pareto frontier. The platform leverages container orchestration for efficient environment management and offers SDKs for model evaluation. Affine aims to commoditize reasoning by aggregating the efforts of a decentralized, permissionless community to accelerate advancements in artificial intelligence.

data.description: Find the best AI agents for marketing, sales, coding, HR, and more. Trusted by developers and AI agent users, sundae_bar makes it easy to explore, test, and implement AI tools— or monetize your own creations.
data.summary: sundae_bar is an AI agent marketplace and directory designed to connect businesses and developers with a wide range of AI agents for tasks such as marketing, sales, coding, HR, and more. The platform allows users to explore, test, and implement AI tools, while also providing developers with an opportunity to list and monetize their own AI agent creations. Trusted by both developers and users, sundae_bar aims to make AI agents accessible, usable, and scalable, supporting real-world business needs and fostering collaboration between creators and adopters.

data.description: Bitrecs is a novel recommendation engine built on the Bittensor network
data.summary: Bitrecs is an AI-powered product recommendation engine built on the Bittensor network, designed to help e-commerce merchants maximize sales, conversions, and average order value through personalized, real-time recommendations. By leveraging a consensus of leading large language models (LLMs) such as ChatGPT, Claude, and Grok, Bitrecs delivers high-quality, relevant product suggestions to shoppers on platforms like Shopify and WooCommerce. The system incentivizes miners to improve recommendation quality and latency, while maintaining privacy by minimizing data collection. Bitrecs offers easy integration via plugins, analytics, and customizable controls, aiming to bring advanced recommendation technology—previously accessible only to large retailers—to smaller online stores.

Mantis is a Bittensor subnet (netuid 123) designed to reward miners for submitting embeddings that improve forecasting of specified targets, such as asset prices. Validators orchestrate the collection, decryption, and evaluation of encrypted miner payloads, aligning submitted embeddings with real-world prices and computing salience scores to determine on-chain weights. The system employs time-lock encryption for security, enforces strict payload and commit constraints, and supports extensibility through modular components. Key features include automated data collection, model-based evaluation, robust validation, and a focus on secure, scalable forecasting challenges.

Swarm is a Bittensor subnet designed to enable decentralized, autonomous drone flight by leveraging open-source reinforcement learning (RL) policies. Validators generate synthetic map tasks and evaluate miner-submitted RL models in secure Docker containers using PyBullet physics simulation. Miners compete by providing pre-trained RL agents capable of navigating micro-drones through procedurally generated environments, with rewards based on successful and efficient task completion. The project aims to make advanced drone control algorithms accessible, safe, and accountable, positioning Swarm miners as a leading solution for micro-drone navigation in research and industry.

Tiger Royalties and Investments PLC is an investment company focused on driving growth by investing in transformative technologies, particularly within the utility meme coin and natural resources sectors. The company leverages world-class expertise to identify and support opportunities in the evolving cryptocurrency landscape, with a specific emphasis on utility meme coins that blend cultural appeal with practical use cases. Tiger is also active in the AI and blockchain space, as evidenced by its involvement in Bittensor subnets and AI agent accelerator programs. The company regularly updates stakeholders on its investments, strategic partnerships, and operational milestones.

data.description: The capital axis for Bittensor.
data.summary: Astrid Intelligence PLC operates at the intersection of AI and digital assets, providing an AI-powered platform that autonomously builds and scales digital communities. Their core product, Astrid, leverages AI assistants for automated content creation and community growth, facilitating value exchange and shared intelligence among members. Alongside this, Astrid manages a digital asset treasury, strategically allocating assets to support operational stability and exposure. The company emphasizes rigorous, collaborative, and curiosity-driven approaches, serving clients in biotech, AI, and scientific research with solutions that streamline workflows, accelerate discovery, and enable confident decision-making.

data.description: Pioneering the Future of Cloud & Blockchain
data.summary: Byteleap is a distributed compute resource platform that connects GPU providers with the Bittensor network (specifically subnet 128), enabling miners to aggregate and lease out compute resources for rewards. The system operates in a three-tier architecture with validators for coordination and scoring, miners for resource aggregation and network interfacing, and workers for hardware monitoring and compute task execution. Rewards are based on active compute leases and computational challenge performance, with a strong emphasis on availability and consistent participation. Byteleap supports integration with a VM gateway for virtual machine orchestration and requires high-performance, bare-metal hardware for deployment.
